name: AWS Elemental MediaPackage
short: A just-in-time video packaging and origination service on AWS that prepares and protects your video for delivery over the Internet.
description: AWS Elemental MediaPackage is a service that enables video distribution at scale, by securely preparing and protecting live and on-demand content for delivery to various devices. It simplifies the process of video packaging and origination by handling the complexity of video processing and packaging. MediaPackage supports just-in-time packaging, digital rights management, and dynamic ad insertion, providing a reliable, secure, and scalable way to deliver high-quality video streaming to viewers.
